constantValues: Measured value for a given aggregate KPI in a given context.

definitions.description: Measured value for a given aggregate KPI in a given context.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: aggregateKPIContextId

constantValues: Parent aggregate KPI context for the aggregate record.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Parent aggregate KPI context for the aggregate record.

members.name: count

constantValues: Total number of items in the aggregate.

members.description: Total number of items in the aggregate.

members.name: max

constantValues: The largest amount for any one item in the aggregate.

members.description: The largest amount for any one item in the aggregate.

members.name: mean

constantValues: The average value of the items in the aggregate.

members.description: The average value of the items in the aggregate.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: measuredById

constantValues: The person who measured the aggregate.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: The person who measured the aggregate.

members.name: measuredOn

constantValues: The date upon which the aggregate was measured.

members.description: The date upon which the aggregate was measured.

members.name: min

constantValues: The lowest value in the aggregate.

members.description: The lowest value in the aggregate.

members.name: name

constantValues: Name of the aggregate KPI measurement.

members.description: Name of the aggregate KPI measurement.

members.name: stdDev

constantValues: The standard deviation of the values in the aggregate.

members.description: The standard deviation of the values in the aggregate.

members.name: targetValue

constantValues: The desired goal value of the aggregate.

members.description: The desired goal value of the aggregate.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: unitId

constantValues: The unit of measure used for this aggregate.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: The unit of measure used for this aggregate.
